channel.title: Italian on Table41NYC
channel.description: Recent content in Italian on Table41NYC

item.title: The Sosta
item.description: This place was ok. Pasta was good, but it needs protein. The meat cheese board was just ok.

item.title: Lilia Cafe
item.description: Had to make reservations 30 days ahead of time. Food was decent. Interior is nice. Homemade pasta. Good date place. Slightly overrated. Very similar to Culver City Bucato (before it shuttered) a few years ago.

item.title: I Sodi
item.description: Food was just ok even though it’s highly recommended by people. Probably a good date place though.

item.title: Lasagna Ristorante
item.description: Lots of food for lunch and just ok.

item.title: Gran Sasso
item.description: Really good. Homemade pasta, and steak was good. Wasn’t that expensive either. Has been renamed to Scriptum Brooklyn. Not sure if it’s the same place.

item.title: Grazie
item.description: I only ate here because it was close to the MET. I don’t remember what I had, but I’ve only written that it was good.
